#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>

#define MAX 100000

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t,i,a[26],counts;

    scanf("%d",&t);

    char s[MAX];

    while(t--)
    {

        for(i=0;i<26;i++)
            a[i]=0;

        counts=0;
        scanf("%s",s);

        for(i=0;i<strlen(s);i++)
        {
            a[s[i]-'a']++;
        }

        for(i=0;i<26;i++)
            if(a[i]>0)
                counts++;


        //(counts&1)? printf("Counter Terrorist\n"): printf("Terrorist\n");

        if(counts%2!=0)
            printf("Counter Terrorist\n");
        else
            printf("Terrorist\n");


    }
}
